fxInfo_clarification: For this question, no limit means the constitution specifies there is no limit on the number of terms and not specified means the constitution does not specify whether or not there is a limit.
fxInfo_ordering: This question is asked only if JUDCRTS is answered 2.
fxInfo_question: What restrictions are in place regarding the number of terms judges on the Constitutional Court may serve?

fxInfo_responses.value: No successive terms permitted, but multiple non-successive terms permitted
Only two successive terms permitted, but multiple non-successive terms permitted
Other, please specify in the comments section
